mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER_ATTENDANCE ( MEMBER_ID, LAST_LOGIN_DATE, COUNT, CONSECUTIVE_DAYS, UPDT_DT ) VALUES ( #{memberId}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d'), 1, 1, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER_ATTENDANCE SET LAST_LOGIN_DATE = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d'), CONSECUTIVE_DAYS = CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), LAST_LOGIN_DATE) = 1 THEN CONSECUTIVE_DAYS + 1 ELSE 1 END, COUNT = #{count} + 1, UPDT_DT = NOW() WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
